t: What Type of Paint to Use For a Projector Screen
s: September 16, 2023 - Reputable brands like Digital Image Screen Paint or Paint on Screen have specific formulas that adjust the paint to your setup. The drawback with these paints is their high cost, often ranging from $150-200 per gallon. But if this is beyond your budget, there are more affordable options at your local hardware store.
